author: ehillenius
msg: objects of numbers without decimal positions are better converted without using the number format. Otherwise, e.g. 2005 displays 2,005 for the English, and 2.005 for the dutch locale.
added java.sql.Date to the converter map.

author: ehillenius
msg: include pattern in exception if possible

author: jonl
msg: Minor: Added and used getModelLock() method to fix potential ConcurrentModificationException in guestbook examples (since model is shared across sessions).
